price: (Nuko bashaka kumugirira nabi) maze atakambira Nyagasani we agira ati “Mu by’ukuri aba bantu ni abagizi ba nabi (ubandinde).”
arabic: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ قَوۡمٞ مُّجۡرِمُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: fadaʿā rabbahu anna hāulāi qawmun muj'rimūna
